edus.text: so basic remote operation runs as follows , press button makes connection with the power source and the rest of the circuit , chip senses the connection , chip produces morse code infra-red signal , specific to that button .
edus.speaker: B

edus.text: so you press the button , it produces signal that's encoded specifically for that button .
edus.speaker: B

edus.text: transistors amplify that signal and it goes to the t_v_'s centre , which interprets the signal response accordingly , changes channel etcetera .
